    • DataFrame

      public DataFrame(Object[][] inputData) throws fr.uga.bib.TypeException
      Create a DataFrame from a table of values.
      Parameters:
      inputData - an array of arrays of values.
      Throws:
      fr.uga.bib.TypeException - if a value type is not supported.

    • DataFrame

      public DataFrame(String filename) throws fr.uga.bib.TypeException, IOException
      Create a DataFrame from a SCV file.
      Parameters:
      filename - the SCV file name where to read the data.
      Throws:
      IOException - if the file is unreadable.
      fr.uga.bib.TypeException - if a value type is not supported.

    • loc

      public DataFrame loc(String... colNames)
      Returns a sub-DataFrame containing all rows of the specified columns.
      Parameters:
      colNames - an array of column names to include in the sub-DataFrame.
      Returns:
      a sub-DataFrame containing all rows of the specified columns.

    • iloc

      public DataFrame iloc(int startLine, int endLine)
      Returns a sub-DataFrame containing all columns and rows between the specified indices.
      Parameters:
      startLine - the index of the first row to include in the sub-DataFrame
      endLine - the index of the last row to include in the sub-DataFrame
      Returns:
      a sub-DataFrame containing all columns and rows between the specified indices

    • locWhere

      public <T extends Comparable<T>> DataFrame locWhere(String label, Class<T> type, Operator op, T condValue)
      Returns a DataFrame that satisfies the given condition on a specific column.
      Parameters:
      label - the name of the column to filter.
      op - the condition to apply on the values of the column.
      condValue - the value to compare the column values against.
      Returns:
      a DataFrame containing the rows that satisfy the given condition.

    • getMean

      public <T> T getMean(String label)
      Returns the mean of the given column.
      Parameters:
      label - the label of the column.
      Returns:
      the mean value of the column as a Double.
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if the label correspond to no column.
      fr.uga.bib.TypeException - if a value can not be converted to a numeric value.
